name: mpteq1i
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c1))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c1)), wceq(c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c1)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

comment: An equality theorem for the maps-to notation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
